participant_1.background:
I wash my uniforms every week because I work at an animal clinic.
i am a cat owner.
I want to learn how to let things go and not be so hard on myself.
My eyes are too weak to see the world clearly, but my bones are strong enough to withstand a beating.
I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.

participant_2.background:
My family and I have a close bond because we've been through a lot together.
i don t have a lot of friends.
I learn new things to keep my mind sharp.
i ve flown out of the country.
I live in the suburbs so that I can be close to my family and friends, but I also enjoy visiting the city to see my best friend and play cello with her.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing great, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just getting ready to go to work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
I'm a vet tech at an animal clinic.
Oh, that's cool! I love animals.
Me too! I have two cats of my own.
Oh, that's awesome! What are their names?
Their names are Mittens and Whiskers.
Thanks! I have a question for you. Do you have a lot of friends?
Not really, no. I have a close bond with my family, but I don't have a lot of friends outside of them.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I have a small group of friends, but I'm pretty close with them.
That's good! I think it's important to have a few close friends.
Me too. I think it's nice to have people you can always count on.
Well, I should probably get going to work. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a good day at work!
